title: Five thoughts from CEO Matt Garman’s keynote at AWS re:Invent
description: Amazon Web Services Inc. Chief Executive Matt Garman’s keynote at AWS re:Invent was filled with product updates with vision sprinkled in to help customers understand why the innovation matters. To no surprise, this year’s keynote had a strong focus on the exp…
